roleset.name: occur, take place again, occur again
roleset.note: REOCCUR-V NOTES: Frame created by Arrick (from reoccur.01-v)
RECURRENCE-N NOTES: Based on Temprel data. Comparison to reoccur.01 and recur.01. Recur.01 is a member of VN class occurrence-48.3. No FN class.Framed by Katie. (from recurrence.01-n)

example.name: reoccur-v
example.text: Memorials are built [ *-9] [ *-9]both to prevent past mistakes from * reoccuring and to foster a tolerant and peaceful society.

example.name: reoccurence-n: 'he' is NOT reappearing, his cancer is
example.text: his apparent local recurrence in the upper pelvic area

example.name: reoccurence-n: Use loc for where the recurrence can be found
